verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou hast turned my mourning
Into dancing for me.
Thou hast put off my sackcloth.
Thou hast turned my mourning
Into dancing for me,
And girded me with gladness
To the end that my glory
May sing praise to Thee and not be silent.
O Lord, my God,
I will give thanks unto Thee forever.
